summary:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles!
TMNT\'s symbolic shell, now in armor form. Comes in a set with shell-armor and a mask. Masks are available in colors matching those of all TMNT characters, with the addition of a \"Mask of Zoro\"-esque black version.
descriptionHtml:
TMNT Armor
A Higeyosi Mod

[img]http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/otyahanabi/imgs/1/9/195204f1.jpg[/img]

[size=+1][color=#ff8c00][b]Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles![/b][/color][/size]
TMNT\'s symbolic shell, now in armor form. Comes in a set with shell-armor and a mask. Masks are available in colors matching those of all TMNT characters, with the addition of a \"Mask of Zoro\"-esque black version.

[size=+1][color=#ff8c00][b]How to Get It[/b][/color][/size]
Creatable at any forge.
?TMNT armor: 1 Dragon Bone, 1 Dragon Scales, 2 Leather Strips
?TMNT mask: 1 Linen Wrap

[size=+1][b]The armor can be found in the Daedric category, but you do not need its smithing perk to forge it.[/b][/size]

[size=+1][color=#ff8c00][b]Licensing / Legal[/b][/color][/size]
Feel free to include or edit these items for your own mods, but please give me credit where applicable.

[size=+1][color=#ff8c00][b]Special Thanks![/b][/color][/size]
Screenshot: DRAGONPORN
[url=http://dragonporn.ldblog.jp/]http://dragonporn.ldblog.jp/[/url]

Description Translation: Hagu (Youtube LPs: HaguDeGozaru)
[url=http://www.youtube.com/user/HaguDeGozaru]http://www.youtube.com/user/HaguDeGozaru[/url]
author: Higeyosi
